gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves and SK Hynix expands output.

gtpi.text: Token costs are sliding on aggressive API price wars and efficiency gains from model competition.

gagl.text: AI-driven electricity demand near 244 TWh annually is stressing grids, raising the need for baseload and nuclear adoption.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment is cautiously optimistic, with growth tempered by concerns over capex intensity and sustainability.
